content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) SINGAPORE/MUMBAI  April 28 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has upgraded India-based Tata Motors Limited's (TML) Long-Term Issuer Default Rating (IDR) to 'BB+' from 'BB'. The Outlook is Stable. The upgrade reflects the sustained improvement in TML's Indian automotive business over the last two years  supported by growing commercial vehicle volumes  successful new product launches in the passenger vehicle segment  as well as the management's renewe
name: Tata Motors Ltd
title: Fitch Upgrades Tata Motors to 'BB+'; Outlook Stable

content: I was shocked beyond words at the happenings at the board meeting of October 24  2016. Apart from the invalidity and illegality of the business that was conducted  I have to say that the board of directors has not covered itself with glory. To "replace" your Chairman without so much as a word of explanation and without affording him an opportunity of defending himself in a summary manner must be unique in the annals of corporate history. The suddenness of the action  and the lack of explanation

title: FULL TEXT-Letter sent by Cyrus Mistry  former Chairman of Tata Group  to directors of Tata Sons Ltd

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) SINGAPORE  May 03 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed India-headquartered Tata  Motor Limited's (TML) Long-Term Foreign-Currency Issuer Default Rating (IDR) at  'BB'. The Outlook is Stable. The rating reflects TML's small size in relation to global auto majors and its  profitable wholly owned subsidiary  Jaguar Land Rover (JLR  BB-/Positive)  which  accounted for 75% of TML's  consolidated revenue and 90% of EBITDA in the  financial year

title: Fitch Affirms Tata Motors at 'BB'; Outlook Stable

title: UPDATE 2-Tata Motors net profit down 56 pct as Jaguar Land Rover Chinese sales drop

content: NEW DELHI  May 26 Tata Motors Ltd  India's biggest automaker by revenue  reported a drop in quarterly net profit due to a spike in costs despite steady sales of its luxury Jaguar Land Rover unit and an increase in demand for its cars in its home market.
name: Tata Motors Ltd
title: India's Tata Motors net profit falls 56 pct  misses estimates

content: NEW DELHI Weak demand for sleek Jaguars in China battered the profits of its parent Tata Motors  pushing its shares down 5 percent on Wednesday and showing the car maker lacked agility in a market where the appetite for brash luxury has ebbed.
name: Tata Motors Ltd
title: China's luxury slowdown leaves Tata Motors nursing wounds

name: Tata Motors Ltd
title: UPDATE 2-China's luxury slowdown leaves India's Tata Motors nursing wounds

content: MUMBAI The Nifty ended little-changed on Wednesday as gains in banking stocks on expectations of a rate cut offset a fall in shares of Tata Motors.
name: Tata Motors Ltd
title: Sensex ends flat as rate-cut hopes offset earnings disappointment

content: * Says price of new version of Nano to start at 199 000 rupees ($3 127.21) ex-showroom delhi
name: Tata Motors Ltd
title: BRIEF-India's Tata Motors unveils new Nano version starting at $3 127

content: MUMBAI  March 24 Indian shares fell to the lowest close in nearly six weeks on Tuesday as gains in healthcare stocks such as Lupin were offset by fall in Tata Motors  which dropped ahead of a board meet to consider a rights issue.
name: Tata Motors Ltd
title: Indian shares near 6-week low; Tata Motors falls

content: DETROIT  Feb 25 Jaguar Land Rover is eyeing North America as a possible site to build a vehicle assembly plant  the former head of the British luxury automaker's parent said according to Automotive News.
name: Tata Motors Ltd
title: Tata's ex-chair: Jaguar Land Rover looking at N. American plant -report

content: MUMBAI  Feb 17 India's Tata Motors  said on Tuesday it sold 80 499 vehicles in January 2015 on a wholesale basis  unchanged on the same period a year ago.
name: Tata Motors Ltd
title: India's Tata Motors January global sales flat at 80 499 vehicles

content: MUMBAI  Feb 6 India's NSE index fell on Friday  heading towards its biggest weekly loss in eight  as blue-chips such as Tata Motors slumped on weak earnings and on worries the Bharatiya Janata Party may face defeat in Delhi elections.
name: Tata Motors Ltd
title: India's NSE index heading towards biggest weekly fall in eight on earnings

name: Tata Motors Ltd
title: Tata Motors January vehicle sales up 5 pct y-o-y

content: MUMBAI  Feb 5 Tata Motors Ltd  India's biggest automaker by revenue  posted a fall in quarterly profit  missing analyst estimates  due to losses in its domestic business  unfavourable foreign exchange rates and a dip in sales at its Jaguar Land Rover unit.
name: Tata Motors Ltd
title: UPDATE 1-India's Tata Motors Q3 profit down 26 pct  misses estimates

content: MUMBAI  Feb 5 India's Tata Motors Ltd  said it expects to spend between 3.6 billion pounds ($5.51 bln) and 3.8 billion pounds ($5.8 bln) on capital expenditure at its luxury Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) unit in the fiscal year starting April 1.
name: Tata Motors Ltd
title: India's Tata Motors expects up to $5.8 bln in capex for JLR

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) SINGAPORE/MUMBAI  January 29 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed India-based Tata  Motor Limited's (TML) Long-Term foreign currency Issuer Default Rating (IDR) at  'BB'. The Outlook is Stable. KEY RATING DRIVERS Strong Financial Profile: TML's consolidated financial profile remains strong  with consolidated leverage (net debt/ operating EBITDA) of 0.6x in in the  financial year ending 31 March 2014 (FY14) (FY13: 1.09x). The company's net
name: Tata Motors Ltd
title: Fitch Affirms Tata Motors at 'BB'; Outlook Stable

content: NEW DELHI  Feb 5 Tata Motors Ltd  India's biggest automaker by revenue  posted a 25.5 percent fall in quarterly net profit  missing analyst estimates  weighed down by losses in its India business as vehicle sales fell.
name: Tata Motors Ltd
title: CORRECTED-India's Tata Motors Q3 profit down 26 pct  misses estimates

content: NEW DELHI  Jan 22 Tata Motors Ltd  India's top automaker by revenue  is looking to shake off its image as a taxi supplier by targeting younger customers with its new Bolt hatchback model.
name: Tata Motors Ltd
title: India's Tata Motors targets younger drivers with new Bolt model
